universal_guidelines: Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a modern, clean look.
Use 'Inter' for body text for maximum readability.
Primary color is Deep Indigo (#1e1b4b). Use it for primary actions and active states.
Accent color is Soft Gold (#d4af37). Use sparingly for premium touches (e.g., VIP status, special offers).
Layouts must be spacious. Use 'p-6' or 'p-8' for container padding.
Cards should be flat with a subtle border ('border-slate-100') and very soft shadow.
Avoid gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures if needed.
All interactive elements must have a hover state (e.g., 'hover:bg-slate-50').
Currency formatting: '1 000 000 UZS' (space as thousand separator).
Ensure high contrast for text. No gray-on-gray that is hard to read.
Sidebar should be dark ('bg-slate-900') to contrast with the light content area.
Charts should use the brand palette (Indigo, Gold, Emerald, Slate).
Do not use 'teal' colors as they are forbidden.
Do not center-align everything. Use left alignment for text and forms.
